TopicTitle: Platform Enigma- an off topic chat thread.

Articles.Content: Rage097 stops the sword dead in its tracks, grabs it, and uses the leverage to throw Leon a large distance away while suffering minor damage. His eyes are solid red.
*Shoots Rage097 through the eye with a rail gun*
Rage097 shrugs off the damage and fires a single shot at Leon with never before seen accuracy. All the while maintaining an emotionless expression and remaining perfectly silent.
*Shot bounces off diamond plate armour* *Launches rail gun barrage at Rage then finishes of with a Tsar Bomba*
Am I the only one bored with the recent "conversation" in this thread?

Am I the only one bored with the recent "conversation" in this thread?

If you wish for it to change, suggest a topic then. This is what happens if we have nothing better to do.

yeah

suddenly

After a blinding explosion and a horrific shockwave. All is silent. The dust settles and rage097 is seen sheilding his face, still standing. He lowers his hands and for the first time, displays anger.
*fires the obliteration cannon at full power*

Rage097 stands amongst the burning hellscape, looking around. He eyes the others with pure hatred when suddenly,

*reserve power depleted*

*passes out*

So climatic.
yay who wants the body lets start the bidding at 9x10^9999999999999 shall we
*plugs rage097 into charger then punches redwolfy* Don't sell people for far more then there worth.

*Pulls plug*

Bidding from Ã‚Â£1 million! Recharger not included
*plugs Rage back in*

[50% charged!]

[Activate now? Y/N]
Yes, turn on now.

[startup.exe]

Loading memory...

Warning: error was detected before shutdown. [Delete memory?]
*kicks*Stupid robot...

Y...

Successful start up!

Wha? Why am I covered in scorch marks and scratches?
What is your function?
Is it weird to feel empathy for robots? Because i'm feeling empathy for Rage097.
IT WORKED! Also as for most of your injuries rage097, I wasn't involved.

...I'm sure.

Function? Well, I uh...hmmm...um.

I actually don't know.

Most of them?

Ok then, lets try to activate one.

*Presses button*
